title: Per capita consumption of chewing gum in selected countries worldwide 2009 to 2012
summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index value in each Country on the y axis.
The Index value is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country India.
There is a difference of 142.0 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country India.
min_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index value in each Country on the y axis.
The Index value is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country India.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index value in each Country on the y axis.
The Index value is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country India.
There is a difference of 142.0 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country India.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Index value for 11 number of Countrys.
Country United States has the highest Index value and India has the lowest Index value.
Second maximum Index value is found at Country Austria.
The Index value of Country United States is 15.2% larger than the minimum value at India.
Index value at Country United States is 152.0 , second place is Austria at 114.0, and thirdly is Belgium at 112.0.
Considered together, the average Index value in all 11 Countrys is roughly 85.73.
The Index value is 943.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
